trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_SEQ_00<tab>Y'shtola would proceed to the Meso Terminal.

TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_SEQ_01<tab>Following a brief reunion with your companions by the aetheryte in Living Memory, Y'shtola deems the party assembled and ready to proceed. The darkened Meso Terminal looms in the distance, awaiting your approach.

TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_SEQ_02<tab>Upon arriving at the foot of the terminal, Sphene relives her recent awakening. She gives thanks to those who have preserved the spirit of her beloved Alexandria, past and present, and together you reaffirm your commitment to fighting against Calyx's callous designs. The opening in the structure's wall glitters with golden energy, inviting you to venture within and confront the architect of Alexandria's mounting mortal dilemma...
※To enlist your companion NPCs for this duty, speak with them near the entrance or access Duty Support via the main menu. Use the Duty Finder if you wish to complete the instance alongside fellow players.

TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_SEQ_03<tab>You have defeated the Endless entities Calyx has sent against you and secured a path to the Meso Terminal's upper reaches. Now you must ascend to the structure's pinnacle, there to bring an end to this calculated confrontation.
※In the event that you leave the area, you may return via the entrance at the foot of the Meso Terminal.

TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_SEQ_04<tab>Calyx commends you on your perseverance in reaching him. As you persist in refusing to yield the key, however, he proceeds to summon an entity designed for the sole purpose of defeating you. The chamber darkens with an innervating chill, and the fear of inevitable death flowing from Alexandria's enthralled citizens feeds the manifestation of a terrifying primal being. Though the device holding Calyx's memories is tantalizingly close, you must first contend with this horror whose grasp promises naught but eternal darkness.
※In the event that you leave the area, you may return via the entrance at the foot of the Meso Terminal.
※To enlist your companion NPCs for this duty, speak with them near the entrance or access Duty Support via the main menu. Use the Duty Finder if you wish to complete the instance alongside fellow players.

TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_SEQ_05<tab>Fighting as one, you triumph over the summoned primal, and you feel the pall of fear lift from your beleaguered hearts. It is time to bring an end to Calyx's Endless ambitions, and return with your companions to the promenades of Living Memory.

TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_SEQ_06<tab>You strike against the memory bank, only to discover it is shielded by a powerful barrier. As Calyx mocks your efforts, the air grows heavy, the weight of mortal dread once more pressing down upon you. In a dry, academic tone, Calyx explains that the experience of death has only strengthened his creation─that it will rise, again and again, until the lightning aether suffusing his ravaged world is drained to its last spark. However, his promise of enduring memories prompts Sphene to recall the true meaning of those words and the comfort they were meant to offer. With Shale's help, she broadcasts a message of hope across Alexandria, buoying the citizens and interrupting the flow of prayer to the primal. Taking advantage of its momentary weakness, your party divides its efforts, with one half battling the entity, and the other working to bring down the barrier protecting the device. Wuk Lamat and Sphene's combined attack finally shatters the energy shield, while Alisaie delivers the killing blow to your enfeebled enemy. Calyx can only monitor the progress of his memory transfer in silent desperation as you spring into action, your decisive strike causing the memory bank to erupt in a spectacular explosion. In the wake of this destruction, Calyx has winked out of existence, and an exhausted Wuk Lamat collapses to the ground, her promise fulfilled.

TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_SEQ_07<tab>You exit the terminal with the unconscious Wuk Lamat, and Alphinaud concludes that his patient will survive to see another morrow─though she will be spending that day and many others resting abed. With Preservation no longer a threat, he offers to remain behind until Vow Koana comes to retrieve her. Meanwhile, you and your comrades must return to the outskirts, and begin the task of putting Alexandria and its people back to rights.

TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_SEQ_08<tab>In the aftermath of the primal summoning, it becomes clear that all who adopted the neo regulators have fallen under the entity's sway. Alexandria's government and citizens have come together to bring the afflicted into custody, but it may help ease Sphene's mind to see the state of the people firsthand.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_TODO_01<tab>Enter the Meso Terminal.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_TODO_02<tab>Enter the Meso Terminal.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_TODO_03<tab>Defeat Necron.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_TODO_04<tab>Defeat Necron.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Alphinaud.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Sphene in the outskirts.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ALPHINAUD_000_001<tab>'Tis good to rejoin you all. I needed to step away briefly that I might make arrangements for a certain precautionary measure...
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ALISAIE_000_005<tab>Last time I had to wait in the cenote, but there's nothing to stop me from joining this fight!
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_GRAHATIA_000_010<tab>We've all been so busy, it seems an age since last we gathered in such a manner. I must say, we do make for a formidable group!
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_KRILE_000_015<tab>Coming here reminds me of my parents. Of the courage they gave me...
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_WUKLAMAT_000_020<tab>Seems Alphinaud and Alisaie were the ones to explain to Koana our need to enter the cenote. He urged us to be extremely careful, of course!
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_025<tab>I had scarcely awakened here when I fell unconscious. Now that I can fully enjoy the gentle silence of this place, it brings tears to my eyes.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_YSHTOLA_000_030<tab>I believe everyone determined to be here is present and accounted for. Shall we make our way to the terminal?
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_YSHTOLA_000_031<tab>We wouldn't wish to keep our insistent host waiting.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ALPHINAUD_000_035<tab>An Endless existence for the evolution of mankind... I understand what he strives for, but not what drives him to do so with such ruthlessness.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ALISAIE_000_040<tab>So this is where the former queen's memories were stored.

TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ALISAIE_000_041<tab>And she herself tried to erase them... Even as an Endless, her resolve was so strong that she would kill her heart to become the cold machine she believed she needed to be.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_GRAHATIA_000_045<tab>When we shut down all the minor terminals, we watched as the Endless faded away. I do not believe that was a performance staged to deceive us.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_GRAHATIA_000_046<tab>As for the Meso Terminal, however... It had already grown dark by the time we had returned from the virtual domain.

TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_GRAHATIA_000_047<tab>While I am loath to admit it, 'tis possible its true appearance was hidden from us in our absence. Which is why we must bring this tale to its denouement by our own hand.

TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_KRILE_000_050<tab>It hadn't occurred to me that one might physically enter the terminal. Although I suppose it makes sense when you think about it. A structure for creating Endless would have required maintenance administered by corporeal hands.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_055<tab>I remember little of my awakening. The paralysis yet lingered, and my eyes could barely focus...
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_YSHTOLA_000_060<tab>Living Memory is steeped in the dense lightning aether of the Ninth. This pervasive energy must be what the terminal utilizes as a power source.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_WUKLAMAT_000_070<tab>Well, here we are again, facing another battle to decide Alexandria's fate.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_071<tab>For four centuries I slept here. Upon awakening, I found the world as I knew it had changed.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_072<tab>I was so frightened at first. I couldn't recognize a single thing, and thought everything I loved had gone to dust.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_073<tab>Yet beneath the unfamiliar surface, much remained the same.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_074<tab>For that, I give thanks to Otis and Zelenia and their royal knights, who lay their lives on the line to defend our way of life.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_075<tab>I thank every Alexandrian, who believed in our future and passed on our legacy.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_076<tab>I thank my other self, who so loved this kingdom of ours.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_077<tab>And I thank you all, for kindling this hope in my heart. This courage to take up arms and fight once more.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_078<tab>So let us make our stand together, and fight for what we hold dear.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_SPHENE_100_078<tab>(-Endless Sphene-)The kind and gentle Queen Sphene was too weak to serve her people. And so she will serve them no more.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_SPHENE_110_078<tab>(-Endless Sphene-)Freed from conscience, I shall become a ruler that <var 1A 02 /var>can<var 1A 01 /var> protect Alexandria. A devourer of worlds.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_A1_000_001<tab>Together we stand. Together we fight.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_A1_000_002<tab>We will rise to the challenge that the Endless Sphene could not.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_080<tab>You have my gratitude. And surely Otis and Zelenia will join us in spirit.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_081<tab>That we shall. Her wish to see Alexandria endure is one I am happy to fulfill.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_WUKLAMAT_000_082<tab>Let's head inside and finish this.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_KRILE_000_083<tab>In the upper reaches of this terminal awaits the device which holds Calyx's memories. It falls to us to make the climb and destroy it once and for all.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_GRAHATIA_000_084<tab>Aye, we must bring matters to a definitive end. We'll not suffer him to cause Alexandria further harm nor claim the key.

TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_YSHTOLA_000_085<tab>The queen entrusted it to <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> for good reason. And besides, 'twould be a tragedy indeed to relinquish a relic with so much research potential.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ALISAIE_000_086<tab>Apparently, Calyx thinks he's taken your measure. I urge you to correct that misguided assumption!

TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ALPHINAUD_000_087<tab>I wholeheartedly concur, yet would still counsel caution. That he would be so bold as to extend us an invitation bespeaks tremendous confidence in his preparations.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_088<tab>Come, friends. We set forth, into the midst of dreaming Endless.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_A2_000_001<tab>Small talk.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_A2_000_002<tab>Form a party and enter the Meso Terminal.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_A2_000_003<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ALPHINAUD_000_095<tab>We have no idea what Calyx may have planned for us. Alisaie and I have prepared for every eventuality, yet still...
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ALPHINAUD_000_096<tab>...Nay, you must be free to lead our charge unhindered by doubt. As you press onwards, we shall guard the flanks.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ALISAIE_000_100<tab>I really do think you take on too much from too many people. And yet...it's never the wrong choice.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ALISAIE_000_101<tab>The queen gave <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> the key for a reason, so I'll be damned if I let Calyx steal it!
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_GRAHATIA_000_105<tab>'Tis beyond knowing how Calyx has advanced his plans for Endless conversion for the past four hundred years.

TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_GRAHATIA_000_106<tab>I do know, however, that pursuing an objective for lengthy spans requires an unyielding will─especially when that objective entails changing the world as we know it.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_GRAHATIA_000_107<tab>Calyx is a foe possessed of both considerable focus and resolve. We would do well to recognize him as such.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_KRILE_000_110<tab>If my parents were indeed executed by Preservation, for me this will not only be a fight for the greater good. This will be justice.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_KRILE_000_111<tab>If I'm to add an addendum to Grandfather's account of the golden city, then let it be a rousing good one, eh?
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_WUKLAMAT_000_115<tab>As the Vow of Resolve, or even as just a comrade, I see myself making a lot of promises.

TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_WUKLAMAT_000_116<tab>I mean to honor every last one of them...starting with the oath I swore to the Endless Sphene. Even if it's just a memory, I want to think of her smiling at that promise kept.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_YSHTOLA_000_120<tab>Calyx's scheme to forfeit flesh to gain immortality calls to mind the Ea. Not that informing him of their fate would do much to dissuade him.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_YSHTOLA_000_121<tab>“Convinced though you may be of this truth, it is yours and not mine. And no conclusion of yours, no matter how grim, can dampen my desire”...
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_YSHTOLA_000_122<tab>Such was my reply to the Ea's warnings. So I know a little something of refusing to listen save when confronted with incontrovertible proof of my error.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_125<tab>The Alexandria of today has seen countless lives come and go. My other self took their grief and fear and rage upon herself in service to our kingdom.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_126<tab>Around me are gathered those willing to give their all to fulfill the promise they made to her. How can I do any less?
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_127<tab>Alexandrians must be free to believe that more than sadness awaits them... That tomorrow can be better than today.

TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_SYSTEM_000_130<tab>During this quest and when using the Duty Support system, you have the opportunity to undertake this trial with a party of NPC companions. Some of these allies' roles will differ from those you are normally able to select.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_SYSTEM_000_135<tab>Proceed to the Ageless Necropolis?
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_A3_000_001<tab>Small talk.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_A3_000_002<tab>Form a party and enter the Ageless Necropolis.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_A3_000_003<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ALPHINAUD_000_145<tab>As I feared, I was right to bring spare warding scales. Against the threat of a primal, we must take advantage of every warrior we can field.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ALISAIE_000_150<tab>The summoning ritual alone made my blood run cold. Like I was halfway to becoming a corpse...
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_GRAHATIA_000_155<tab>An abundance of lightning would indeed obviate the need for crystals. I should like to know whence Calyx came by this summoning knowledge.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_KRILE_000_160<tab>It all finally makes sense. Those mechanical rampages were not orchestrated solely for the purpose of harvesting aether.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_KRILE_000_161<tab>They were intended to heighten the collective fear of death, that the primal manifested by the people's terror would be that much more powerful...
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_WUKLAMAT_000_165<tab>I don't care if that thing is a waking nightmare! Let's send it back into the darkness, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_YSHTOLA_000_170<tab>So, 'tis a primal which embodies the concept of death in all its terror. He has made manifest a most troublesome foe.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_175<tab>What is he saying? That the fears of everyone in Alexandria gave birth to this...this horror?
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_176<tab>It's finally over...
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_YSHTOLA_000_177<tab>Let us bask in the victory a moment, shall we? We can take stock once we've had a chance to recuperate.

TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_KRILE_000_178<tab>I believe Calyx was working to transfer his memories at the end there, but he vanished at the exact moment the device exploded. We must have stopped him just in time...
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ALISAIE_000_179<tab>After dealing that last blow, I hadn't a drop of aether left to spend! Thank you for seeing it through to the end.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_GRAHATIA_100_179<tab>Phew... 'Tis good to be out of that terminal. But what of you? No injuries or lingering ill effects?
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ALPHINAUD_000_180<tab>She has yet to regain consciousness, but worry not─Lamaty'i will be fine.

TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ALPHINAUD_100_180<tab>I've been in touch with Vow Koana, and he has made arrangements to convey her home. By which he means to come and fetch Lamaty'i himself, apparently. Given the extent of her injuries and exertions, she'll likely spend many days abed.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_181<tab>Oh, Wuk Lamat...
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ALISAIE_000_182<tab>You just can't help yourself, can you? Like a certain someone. That said...we couldn't have done it without you.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_KRILE_000_183<tab>And once she had the barrier down, you saw to it that Calyx's stored memories were destroyed along with the memory bank.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_KRILE_000_184<tab>Which means Preservation is no more, I pray.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_185<tab>No longer will Calyx dictate the course of our people...
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ORIGINALSPHENE_100_185<tab>No longer will our grief be locked away or forgotten...
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_186<tab>The freedom to feel joy and sadness─to feel all that we are meant to experience─is in the hands of Alexandrians once more.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_187<tab>I can never thank you enough!
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_YSHTOLA_000_188<tab>When we are rested and ready, we shall have to conduct a thorough investigation into how Calyx came to know that summoning ritual.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_GRAHATIA_000_189<tab>Aye, for where there are primals, the Ascians are ne'er far.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ALPHINAUD_000_190<tab>And we must consider that those who offered up prayers during the summoning may very well have fallen under the entity's sway...
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ALPHINAUD_100_190<tab>I shall wait here with our patient until Vow Koana arrives. Feel free to go on ahead and attend to Alexandria's needs in the meantime.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ALISAIE_000_191<tab>Yes, we should get going. I'll contact Shale en route and ask for an update on the situation in the city.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_192<tab>Shall we make for the outskirts first, then? We can check on things there before heading into Everkeep.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ALPHINAUD_000_195<tab>I expect I shan't be waiting long. After hearing of Lamaty'i's injuries, Koana sounded fit to launch himself here by siege engine.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ALISAIE_000_200<tab>I was able to speak with Shale and Erenville. I'll share the news with everyone in just a moment.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_GRAHATIA_000_205<tab>I've given Sphene an abridged explanation of primals and their enthralling influence. Too much detail would overwhelm her.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_KRILE_000_210<tab>Thank goodness... Things are much calmer than I anticipated.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_YSHTOLA_000_215<tab>No signs of recent violence. The soldiers have been behaving, at least.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_220<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... Everyone has been teaching me what it means to be enthralled by a primal...
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ORIGINALSPHENE_100_220<tab>The outskirts seem untouched by trouble, as far as I can tell, but... What if something awful has happened!?
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ALISAIE_110_220<tab>Deep breaths, Sphene. Erenville and Shale have brought me up to speed.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ALISAIE_120_220<tab>First off... Just as we'd feared, those who adopted the neo regulators appear to have been enthralled.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ALISAIE_130_220<tab>So far, however, they've not shown any hostility towards others. I suspect this was due to the calming effect of your broadcast.

TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ALISAIE_140_220<tab>Government administrators are presently working with the rest of the citizenry to bring the afflicted into the care of the authorities, and I'm happy to report that this seems to be proceeding in a largely peaceful manner.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ALISAIE_150_220<tab>...Which is all well and good, but the city officials are understandably requesting an explanation of events. Raha, Krile, would you be able to handle that?
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_GRAHATIA_000_222<tab>Certainly! We shall return to aid with the treatment efforts forthwith.
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_KRILE_100_222<tab>Meanwhile, might I suggest you look in on the people you fought so very hard to save? It may ease your mind to see the fruits of your efforts firsthand!
TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_224<tab>Thank you again... How very fortunate we are to have you as our allies.

TEXT_KINGMI108_05371_SYSTEM_000_250<tab>You may now enter the Meso Terminal with a party of NPC avatars. To make use of this feature, open the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Trust<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> interface located under <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Duty<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in the main menu.
